other_title: 探偵オペラ ミルキィホームズ (Japanese)
plot: In the future world, people use ‘Toys’ that grant them superhuman abilities like ESP and telekinesis. This has led to a boom in both minor crimes and the need for Toy-using detectives to track down the offenders and bring them to justice. Opera Koyabashi runs the detective agency, Milky Holmes, staffed by four cheerful and energetic girls.
opening_theme: "Seikai wa Hitotsu! Janai!!" (正解はひとつ!じゃない!!) by Milky Holmes
